content:
Zulip has eaten my text 3 times today (e.g, closed the little typing window), leaving me to recover an old version from the drafts pile (usually losing a lot of changes).

It happens a small percentage of the time when I type shift + enter twice in a row (e.g. 2 newlines when "press enter to send" is on). It's infuriating, and never used to happen. I've turned off press enter to send, hopefully that fixes it, maybe if I can also train myself not to do shift + enter for the newlines too.

I'm just venting, but god it sucks. I'm on macos and latest firefox nightly. I don't really think its related to the browser, though, but maybe.
Actually, it just happened while typing normal text, no shift/enter. The window just closed, and I lost everything
Has this happened to anyone else here too?
We are sorry you had to experience this.
This just happened to me. I also noticed that the cursor ended up floating somewhere over the bottom border of the compose area
